snippet: There are not likely to be any new, sweeping investigations involving white-collar crime in President Obama's second term, but prominent cases involving the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act and the fallout from the 2008 financial crisis loom.
abstract: There are not likely to be any new, sweeping investigations involving white-collar crime in President Obama's second term, but prominent cases involving the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act and the fallout from the 2008 financial crisis loom.

headline.main: Inquiries to Watch in a Second Term
